channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Nacon Motorsports: Drive & Thrive
item.description: Feel the exhilaration at your fingertips
item.content:encoded: Experience the full-throttle games of Nacon Motorsports with our latest racing game bundle! This bursting bundle features some of the best racing games on the market with a wide variety of vehicle types and races. Tackle the dunes in your tricked-out buggy in Overpass 2. Lead the charge in our own Rally Car with WRC Generations - The FIA WRC Official Game. Ride on the edge of your motorcycle in TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge 3, and more—and help support The AbleGamers Charity with your purchase!

item.title: Monster Hunter New Year Hunting Collection
item.content:encoded: If you’ve been waiting to get into the smash-hit Monster Hunter, this bundle is your golden opportunity. Get your hands on the two most recent Monster Hunter games, plus both of their critically acclaimed expansions. Monster Hunter World redefined the series when it launched in 2018, and its beloved expansion Iceborne introduced a host of awesome new beasts to hunt alongside plenty of game-changing systems. Monster Hunter Rise and the Sunbreak expansion doubled-down on World’s refinements, with an emphasis on exhilarating dog-riding and wirebug-zipping mobility. Pay what you want for the deluxe versions of both of these must-play games and their expansions, and help support Breakthrough T1D with your purchase!
